Languages.Language 1: Understands the languages of its creator but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 6 Slashing and can frighten

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Scarecrow makes 2 Claw attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Terrifying Glare, The Scarecrow targets a creature, making a terrifying face and screech to frighten the creature

Abilities.Ability 1: False Appearance, While the Scarecrow remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary, inanimate scarecrow

Damage Resistances.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
